org.openscience.smsd.tools
Class TimeManager

java.lang.Object
  org.openscience.smsd.tools.TimeManager

@TestClass(value="org.openscience.cdk.smsd.tools.TimeManagerTest")
public class TimeManager
extends java.lang.Object

Class that handles execution time of the MCS search. long diffSeconds = time / 1000; long diffMinutes = time / (60 * 1000); long diffHours = time / (60 * 60 * 1000); long diffDays = time / (24 * 60 * 60 * 1000);

Author:
Syed Asad Rahman
